message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $12000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that $12000 might be a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm still confident that this product can bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. This is a fair compromise, considering the benefits it will bring to your company.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $11500 is still too high for me. My final offer is $10500.  If you're willing to accept this, we can finalize the deal. Otherwise, I'll need to explore other options.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11250. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope you can see the value in the product and meet me in the middle.
